basic.description: In first semester, students join with the lecture course `Latin America 1850-Today¿. In second semester, students deepen their exploration of Latin America¿s modern history in a seminar format, with emphasis on major controversies, critical reading of historical sources and texts, speaking, research, and writing skills.
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: Modern Latin American History:  Sources and Debates

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    Registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.
Exclusion    No more than 1 course from HIST286; HIST315
